languages.text: "Заметьте, не с вами — с "Вольным Торговцем династии фон Валанциус". Токара не знает о гибели Леди Теодоры и просто ищет встречи с сильным мира сего. Чутье мне говорит, что на Футфоле творится что-то неладное, раз наш астропат уловил столь сильную эмоцию в послании".

traits.locale_text: "Заметьте, не с вами — с "Вольным Торговцем династии фон Валанциус". Токара не знает о гибели леди Теодоры и просто ищет встречи с сильным мира сего. Чутье мне говорит, что на Футфоле творится что-то неладно, раз наш астропат уловил столь сильную эмоцию в послании".

languages.text: "Not you personally — he wishes to meet with the Rogue Trader of the von Valancius dynasty. Tocara does not know about Lady Theodora's death and is simply seeking an audience with the powers that be. My gut is telling me that something must be very wrong on Footfall if our Astropath managed to read such strong emotion in such an anodyne message."
languages.original_text: "Заметьте, не с вами — с "Вольным Торговцем династии фон Валанциус". Токара не знает о гибели Леди Теодоры и просто ищет встречи с сильным мира сего. Чутье мне говорит, что на Футфоле творится что-то неладное, раз наш астропат уловил столь сильную эмоцию в послании".

traits.locale_text: "Not you personally — he wishes to meet with a 'Rogue Trader from the von Valancius dynasty.' Tocara does not know about Lady Theodora's death and simply asks for an audience with the powers that be. My gut is telling me something is very wrong with Footfall if our astropath managed to read such a strong emotion in such an innocent message."

"Not you personally — he wishes to meet with a 'Rogue Trader from the von Valancius dynasty.' Tocara does not know about Lady Theodora's death and simply asks for an audience with the powers that be. My gut is telling me something is very wrong with Footfall if our astropath managed to read such a strong emotion in such an innocent message."

"Not you personally — he wishes to meet with the Rogue Trader of the von Valancius dynasty. Tocara does not know about Lady Theodora's death and is simply seeking an audience with the powers that be. My gut is telling me that something must be very wrong on Footfall if our astropath managed to read such strong emotion in such an anodyne message."

"Not you personally — he wishes to meet with the Rogue Trader of the von Valancius dynasty. Tocara does not know about Lady Theodora's death and is simply seeking an audience with the powers that be. My gut is telling me that something must be very wrong on Footfall if our astropath managed to read such strong emotion in such an anodyne message."

"Not you personally — he wishes to meet with the Rogue Trader of the von Valancius dynasty. Tocara does not know about Lady Theodora's death and is simply seeking an audience with the powers that be. My gut is telling me that something must be very wrong on Footfall if our Astropath managed to read such strong emotion in such an anodyne message."

languages.text: «No es por verle personalmente. Quiere un encuentro con {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente de la dinastía von Valancius. Tocara no sabe de la muerte de Lady Theodora y simplemente busca una audiencia con los poderes fácticos. Si mi instinto no me falla, algo huele a podrido en Paso si nuestro astrópata ha podido captar emociones tan poderosas en un mensaje tan anodino».
languages.original_text: "Not you personally — he wishes to meet with the Rogue Trader of the von Valancius dynasty. Tocara does not know about Lady Theodora's death and is simply seeking an audience with the powers that be. My gut is telling me that something must be very wrong on Footfall if our Astropath managed to read such strong emotion in such an anodyne message."

traits.locale_text: «No es por verle personalmente. Quiere un encuentro con {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente de la dinastía von Valancius. Tocara no sabe de la muerte de Lady Theodora y simplemente busca una audiencia con los poderes fácticos. Si mi instinto no me falla, algo huele a podrido en Paso si nuestro astrópata ha podido captar emociones tan poderosas en un mensaje tan anodino».

languages.text: “他想见的并不是您这个人，而是想与冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的行商浪人见个面。托卡拉还没听说西奥多拉夫人的死讯，他只想与掌权的人见个面。我的直觉告诉我，如果我们的星语者能在如此平淡无奇的信息中读出强烈的渴望，那落脚港肯定是出了什么问题。”
languages.original_text: "Not you personally — he wishes to meet with the Rogue Trader of the von Valancius dynasty. Tocara does not know about Lady Theodora's death and is simply seeking an audience with the powers that be. My gut is telling me that something must be very wrong on Footfall if our Astropath managed to read such strong emotion in such an anodyne message."

traits.locale_text: “他想见的并不是您这个人，而是想与冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的行商浪人见个面。托卡拉还没听说西奥多拉夫人的死讯，他只想与掌权的人见个面。我的直觉告诉我，如果我们的星语者能在如此平淡无奇的信息中读出强烈的渴望，那落脚港肯定是出了什么问题。”

languages.text: 「陛下個人ではなく―あの男はフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝の自由開拓者に会いたいと言っているのです。トカラはシオドーラ様が亡くなったことを知らず、ただ権力者との謁見を求めているのです。こちらの感応通信官がこうも淡々としたメッセージからこれほどに強い感情を読み取っているということは、フットフォールで何か非常におかしな事が起きていると直感が告げています」
languages.original_text: "Not you personally — he wishes to meet with the Rogue Trader of the von Valancius dynasty. Tocara does not know about Lady Theodora's death and is simply seeking an audience with the powers that be. My gut is telling me that something must be very wrong on Footfall if our Astropath managed to read such strong emotion in such an anodyne message."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下個人ではなく―あの男はフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝の自由開拓者に会いたいと言っているのです。トカラはシオドーラ様が亡くなったことを知らず、ただ権力者との謁見を求めているのです。こちらの感応通信官がこうも淡々としたメッセージからこれほどに強い感情を読み取っているということは、フットフォールで何か非常におかしな事が起きていると直感が告げています」

languages.text: "Nicht Euch persönlich – er will {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} der Dynastie von Valancius kennenlernen. Tocara weiß nicht, dass Lady Theodora tot ist, und will schlichtweg eine Audienz bei der Person, die das Sagen hat. Mein Bauchgefühl sagt mir, dass etwas auf Footfall sehr im Argen sein muss, wenn unser Astropath aus einer derart nichtssagenden Nachricht ein so starkes Gefühl herausliest."
languages.original_text: "Not you personally — he wishes to meet with the Rogue Trader of the von Valancius dynasty. Tocara does not know about Lady Theodora's death and is simply seeking an audience with the powers that be. My gut is telling me that something must be very wrong on Footfall if our Astropath managed to read such strong emotion in such an anodyne message."

traits.locale_text: "Nicht Euch persönlich – er will {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} der Dynastie von Valancius kennenlernen. Tocara weiß nicht, dass Lady Theodora tot ist, und will schlichtweg eine Audienz bei der Person, die das Sagen hat. Mein Bauchgefühl sagt mir, dass etwas auf Footfall sehr im Argen sein muss, wenn unser Astropath aus einer derart nichtssagenden Nachricht ein so starkes Gefühl herausliest."

languages.text: « Ce n'est pas vous qui l'intéressez personnellement. Tocara ignore que dame Théodora est décédée et souhaite simplement rencontrer la personne qui dirige la dynastie von Valancius. Mon instinct me dit que Castel doit être dans une situation critique pour que notre astropathe ait réussi à percevoir une émotion aussi forte dans un message anodin. »
languages.original_text: "Not you personally — he wishes to meet with the Rogue Trader of the von Valancius dynasty. Tocara does not know about Lady Theodora's death and is simply seeking an audience with the powers that be. My gut is telling me that something must be very wrong on Footfall if our Astropath managed to read such strong emotion in such an anodyne message."

traits.locale_text: « Ce n'est pas vous qui l'intéressez personnellement. Tocara ignore que dame Théodora est décédée et souhaite simplement rencontrer la personne qui dirige la dynastie von Valancius. Mon instinct me dit que Castel doit être dans une situation critique pour que notre astropathe ait réussi à percevoir une émotion aussi forte dans un message anodin. »

languages.text: "Aslında bizzat şahsınızla değil, von Valancius hanedanlığının Hür Tacir'i ile görüşmek istiyor. Tocara'nın Leydi Theodora'nın ölümünden haberi yok, tek istediği de güç kimdeyse onunla görüşme yapmak. İçimden bir his, Astropatımız böylesi yavan bir mesajda böylesi güçlü bir duygu okumayı başarmışsa Binliman'da bir şeylerin çok yanlış gittiğini söylüyor."
languages.original_text: "Not you personally — he wishes to meet with the Rogue Trader of the von Valancius dynasty. Tocara does not know about Lady Theodora's death and is simply seeking an audience with the powers that be. My gut is telling me that something must be very wrong on Footfall if our Astropath managed to read such strong emotion in such an anodyne message."

traits.locale_text: "İstediği şey kişisel olarak sizi görmek değil, von Valancius hanedanlığının Hür Tacir'i ile tanışmak istiyor. Tocara'nın Leydi Theodora'nın ölümünden haberi yok ve tek istediği gücü elinde bulunduran kişiyle görüşme yapmak. İçimden bir his bana diyor ki; eğer Astropat'ımız böylesi sönük bir mesajda böylesi güçlü bir duygu okumayı başarmışsa, Binliman'da çok yanlış giden bir şeyler var demektir."
